attributes.action: Break the special relationship the UK has with the USA.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The USA appears to be dominating the UK in many things. From going to war and now to extradition. Is it not time we said NO to the USA and Kept Garry McKinnon in Britain. Even more so when Islamic extremists who should be deported are not. It seems unreasonable to me that the law protects one set of people and not the other.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
